texts.content:
I'm Maria Sol Soria üë©‚Äçüíª a Product Manager and Engineer with 3+ years of experience in B2B SaaS companies. I work closely with tech teams to define and lead the product strategy according to customer and business needs.   
I have experience implementing cibersecurity and complience products in some on the biggest and recognized LATAM banks working closely with customers' executives teams.

items.title: Product Management
items.description: I have experience creating Saas product roadmaps from conception to launch, driving product vision, defining go-to-market strategy, and leading design discussions.

items.title: Project Management
items.description: I have developed the ability to prioritize/manage competing project needs and work on a team to develop solutions

items.title: Customer Experience Management
items.description: I ensure a positive customer experience by translating technical concepts and solutions to non-technical and executive audiences.

items.title: Business Analyst
items.description: I have analytical and problem-solving experience combined with excellent business judgment and the ability to present analysis and insights in a clear and compelling manner.

items.title: Entrepreneurship
items.description: I have a passion and talent for building and scaling tech products that are innovative and solving people problems.

items.title: Team Leader

section_title.title: My Portfolio
section_title.subtitle: Visit my portfolio and keep your feedback

texts.content: kriptos is a growing solution dedicated to information classification using artificial intelligence.
kriptos has developed software that allows you to classify documents in windows, one drive, and guide detecting critical information and motivating you to protect against a cyber attack.

my contribution to this project focuses on two edges: 1. Help LATAM's most significant financial clients adopt the product and get the most value possible. 2. Manage the resolution of technical problems, actively participate in creating product roadmaps and manage all the processes of launching a new feature of the products or a new version.
A better synergy and communication between the marketing area, the support area, and the technology area has been one of my achievements in this project because I love working as a team

uShops was the first startup I created together with my co-founder and team. The solution proposed a platform that allowed small and large companies to sell and distribute their products on the Internet.

More than an e-commerce company, uShops intended to become a shopping network, where the experience involved being able to try a product through virtual reality before buying it. And on the other hand, to have a channel of fashion influencers that they can monetize while the economy of the entrepreneurs is growing.

Without a doubt, I found my passion in leadership. I loved leading my engineering, marketing, UX/ UI design, support, sales, and logistics teams. This experience allowed me to help create jobs and enjoy creating technology for a common problem in society.

ClickGas is a mobile application that helps you request a GAS cylinder when you need it from the comfort of your home‚Äîpreventing the trucks that distribute this product from continuing to cause noise pollution due to the excessive noise they make in the streets when trying to sell said product.
ClickGas was one of the projects in which I got involved in the management of mobile application development, learning about new geolocation technologies.

My most important achievements in these projects lie in improving the management of agile teams by implementing methodologies such as OKRs and Scrum. Additionally, my job was to transmit the project's vision to stakeholders such as the municipality of Quito and the GAS associations in the city.

IMS is an inventory and billing system that allows businesses to control and manage the flow of their products. In this project, I had fun implementing agile team management methodologies. My job was to guide the UX and UI development and design team to meet the goals and objectives. I had the opportunity to build and structure my development, infrastructure, and UX/UI design team.

Global copiers is an application that allows you to record the technical information of industrial printers distributed in different companies so that the technical staff can access valuable information about the machine with just one click through its IP address.

I was responsible for everything related to the design of the interface and the image within the project, managing the test plans to test the new software and improve the usability of the platform together with the development team.
Kuapp is an application that was born as an idea in a Platzi challenge, in which six totally unknown people of different nationalities got together.

This application aims to solve the need for people to feel that they belong to a social group and the desire to discover new groups and activities where they can develop what personally when they are a tourist in a new place.
I was helping find techniques for effective MVP goal setting and product backlog management, as well as helping the team understand the need for clear and concise Product Backlog items.

Together with the IOM, UNODC, and the Ministry of Government, we developed a dashboard that allows visualizing statistical data and an interactive map of the crimes of trafficking in persons and smuggling of migrants in Ecuador.

In this project, I enjoyed managing software development and interface design. Additionally, I learned to communicate with managers of government entities in the follow-up sessions and presentation of project results.

Bummler was a business idea that allows large and small businesses to create a more innovative advertising strategy based on their geolocation, using an advertising technique to target consumers based on their physical location through a small device called Beacon and a mobile application.
This solution was intended to eliminate printed advertising such as flyers and avoid contact between people and promoters.

My central role in this project was to be the product manager. I specialized in product design and development with a leadership position within the project with the skills to handle various tasks and lead a cross-functional team in the product ideation stage. product

Team of electronic and mechanical engineers with the challenge of providing technological solutions in the global health emergency caused by COVID-19, with the help of health experts, we are working to find a solution to the anticipated national lack of mechanical fans in Ecuador SMET C19 seeks to make available to the country a prototype of low-cost, compact and easy-to-build respirators, in the face of the current health emergency.

As the team leader, he performed functions such as: promoting teamwork, planning the different phases of the project, assigning the different roles in the team, directing and coordinating resources, managing the project's external relations, transmitting the results to stakeholders, management risks derived from the execution of tests and guarantee of compliance with FDA regulations.

items.title: BY MY EYES - Blind People Assistance Device

texts.content: This project is based on the need to move from one place to another without suffering mishaps in a blind person. A bracelet consists of an ultrasonic sensor that will emit a slight vibration when an object around it is detected. It is a social project that seeks to raise the standard of living of these people with disabilities. Additional functions are incorporated to capture different market areas, making the project more economically profitable. .

It is a bracelet that will emit an alarm when the person leaves their residence to facilitate the safety of the person with different abilities‚Äîexpanding the market field to people who have recently undergone eye surgery.

As a project manager, I ensure that the work is done efficiently and satisfactorily. I was in charge of setting and managing client expectations, developing a detailed project plan, defining the project's scope, and assigning team members to specific tasks depending on each of the skills.

items.title: Temperature Control of an Intelligent Classroom

texts.content: The work tries to identify which thermal factors relate the environment temperature and the body temperature with the emotion's students at smart classroom, where after the work tries to determine which thermal factors relate the environment temperature and the body temperature with the emotion's students at smart classroom, where after will be getting a social point about the emotion students by reference to the controller.

Experimental tests are performed with students of the National Polytechnic School to identify common emotions and how the change in external temperature and other factors influence the student's feelings and internal temperature.

I had the opportunity to be the owner of the creative process of each of the stages of the project, who defined what should apply ideas to promote the essential objectives of the project. She designed external strategies through market research and technological research to analyze user expectations.

The general objective of this work is to design and implement advanced control techniques, nonlinear PI, sliding mode control, and control by numerical methods based on linear algebra applied to the FESTO reactor station of the Industrial Process Control laboratory.
With this project, I had the opportunity to manage the research, present a scientific article at an international level, and give the study to various engineering experts worldwide.
My passion for design and robotics prompted me to create PRIME BOT robot.
It was my little personal project in college which I built and programmed with the help of a great friend. It allowed me to lead the dance team in the robotics club to mentor the new members.
This small humanoid robot has participated in multiple competitions, always finishing among the first three places.
